r.d: This class provides a simple API to the DICT Protocol handling all the network related issues and providing DICT responses in PHP datatypes to make it easy for a developer to use DICT servers in their programs.
r.n: - Use new header comment blocks. - Adhere to PEAR CS & other minor cleanups. - Add disconnect() method. - Fix include path in example. - Fix saving server information in connect(). - Fix incorrect variable check in define() which threw a warning. - Set $_socket by reference, not by copy. - Add error handling in connect() when the server rejects the connection.
